description: Attorney Neal Gainsberg founded his Chicago law firm with the goal of protecting the rights of the residents of Cook County and surrounding northeastern Illinois. Mr. Gainsberg takes immense pride in representing the interests of average Chicagoans as they take on individuals, professionals and corporations in legal actions resulting from negligent, illegal or immoral acts...
